extendedInfo.description: **Updated for 2014-15 tax year from today's budget****Now the free version allows you to use previous and future tax years and reverse calculating!**In addition to being a highly accurate UK PAYE tax calculator, this is the only app on the market that lets you work backwards from any figure (tax/ni/student loan etc) to find the gross and give a complete breakdown.Features:* Tax Breakdown* NI Breakdown (time limited)* Pension Breakdown* Tax years supported*   2014/15*   2013/14*   2012/13*   2011/12*   2010/11*   2009/10*   2008/09* Student Loan repayments* Pension contributions* Age related benefits* Tax codes (ending in L,P,Y,T or K)* Blind Persons Allowance* Enter figures in Year/Month/Week* View results in Year/Month/Week* Reverse calculate from a net figure* Compare any two sets of figures easily by seeing the differences in the same style breakdown screen* Updates figures live as you type* Save preferences

reviews.title: Pathetic
reviews.comment: Popup after every button press. Unusable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was okay...
reviews.comment: Latest update means everytime I press the screen it tells me to buy the paid  version. Can\'t even use it...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not very useful if it only supports tax codes ending with L. Page layout poor on phones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not working properly
reviews.comment: keep getting a message popping up telling yot to purchase full version everytime you press a button
reviews.author: A Google User
